document_data.name: Letty Tallbane
document_data.mainbody: tty had pixie-cut orange hair and wore a light [[fabric]] and [[leather]] outfit. She carried a simple [[staff]] as her weapon.
document_data.Description: Letty had pixie-cut orange hair and wore a light [[fabric]] and [[leather]] outfit. She carried a simple [[staff]] as her weapon.
document_data.History:
{{quote |Hmm… What to get? What to get?
What a great selection…
We could use a [[torch]] or two… |Letty}} Letty camped at the ruins of [[Beckside Castle]] on the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] around the time of the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] and [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]]. She faced choice paralysis while looking at [[Breagar Coppervein]]'s selection of goods, finding the [[torch]]es particularly compelling.
